title: BUG wih connecting in game
body: I can't join a game.That say's there is a problem and i click send report and nothing.Can you fix it my friends can join but I can't.Ty<3!!!

replies.body: Hmmmm without having much more info, my best guess is that your client was having problems getting your connected to the match you were placed in. There's a number of different reasons that could happen, but typically we can fix it by making some adjustments to your network settings. Go through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and you should be able to get back on the Rift!
